description: The refresh_security_group_* methods that compute manager passes to the virtualization driver are not documented in the FakeConnection class.  This is important because FakeConnection is the canonical source for methods that drivers will need to inherit, and is referred to as such in our developer documentation.
title: security group methods not in virt/fakes.py

comments.content: The refresh_security_group_* methods that compute manager passes to the virtualization driver are not documented in the FakeConnection class.  This is important because FakeConnection is the canonical source for methods that drivers will need to inherit, and is referred to as such in our developer documentation.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~xtoddx
